StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [DeletePointOfContact]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PointOfContactID uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
--IMPORTANT NOTE: Add begin and end transac.on IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [USMC].PointOfContact where [PointOfContactID] = @PointOfContactID and @PointOfContactID IS NOT NULL)
BEGIN -- then delete the exisi.ng record DELETE from [USMC].PointOfContact where [PointOfContactID] = @PointOfContactID
END
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
